thread.title: Gigamon to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 22, 2015
thread.title_full: Gigamon to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 22, 2015

title: Gigamon to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 22, 2015
text: Gigamon to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 22, 2015   Published on 2015-10-05 13:30:59 Gigamon to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 22,... -- SANTA CLARA, Calif.  Gigamon logo Gigamon logo  ><- stripped tags -> SANTA CLARA, Calif.   Gigamon Inc. (NYSE: [[]]), the leader in traffic visibility solutions, today announced that it will release its financial results for the third quarter ended September 26, 2015 after the market closes on Thursday, October 22, 2015 . The company will host a conference call and live webcast for analysts and investors at 5:00 p.m. Eastern time on that day. The news release with the financial results will be accessible from the company's website prior to the conference call. Parties in the United States and Canada can access the call by dialing +1 (888) 632-3384, using conference code 793805. International parties can access the call by dialing +1 (785) 424-1675, using conference code 793805. The webcast will be accessible on Gigamon's investor relations website at http://investor.gigamon.com for a period of one year. A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available through Thursday, October 29, 2015 . To access the replay, parties in the United States and Canada should call +1 (888) 203-1112 and enter conference code 793805. International parties should call +1 (719) 457-0820 and enter conference code 793805. Gigamon Gigamon (NYSE: GIMO ) provides active visibility into physical and virtual network traffic enabling stronger security and superior performance. Gigamon's Visibility Fabric â„¢ and GigaSECURE, the industry's first Security Delivery Platform, deliver advanced intelligence so that security, network and application performance management solutions in enterprise, government and service provider networks operate more efficiently and effectively. See more at www.gigamon.com , the Gigamon Blog , or follow Gigamon on Twitter , LinkedIn or Facebook .
